verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Our God has triumphed gloriously;
The horse and the rider are thrown into the sea.
The Lord is my strength and the Lord is my song
And forever he will dwell in me.
So sing, sing, sing unto the Lord.
With timbrel and dances sing unto the Lord.
The Lord is my strength,
And the Lord is my song.
And forever He will dwell in me.
